events.message: Customer has filed a claim reporting a car collision that occurred last night involving significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and claim details.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the investigation and customer communication.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and explaining the next steps in the process.
Requested submission of police report, vehicle registration, and photographs of the collision damage from the customer.
Customer has submitted all requested documents, including police report and photos, for further processing.
Initiated investigation by the claims adjuster to assess the extent of damage and verify circumstances of the accident.
Completed on-site inspection and reviewed all evidence to finalize the accident details and liability.
A settlement proposal covering repairs and associated costs was sent to the customer for review.
Customer responded with appreciation for timely communication and acceptance of the proposed settlement amount.
The claim has been formally approved based on the investigation and customer agreement to the settlement terms.
Issued payment for the approved settlement amount directly to the customerâ€™s designated bank account.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following the payment and confirmation from the customer.
